TopicTitle: Texture issue when placing certain parts inside fairings

Articles.Content:
Windows KSP x64, Version 1.10.1 

When placing medium/small landing gear inside fairings and reloading the craft (closing and opening the craft) the gear will become grey and read ATTACH across the side. The bug can happen to one or both parts when symmetry is enabled. I've had others test this and have had the same issue so I am fairly certain it isn't my computer or install (freshly installed)
interesting... i have this thing happening with vector engines...
the inside of big cargo bays have this issue too if you put them inside a big fairing
